title: A Full and true account of the inhumane and bloudy cruelties of the papists to the poor Protestants in Ireland in the year, 1641 published now to encourage all Protestants to be liberal in their contribution for their relief and speedy delivering them now out of the hands of those bloudy-minded people.
author: Digby, Lettice, Lady, 1588?-1658.
notes: "The rebells letter to the Lady Offalia ...," p. 29-30, signed: Henry Dempsy ... [et al.]
"The Lady Offalia her answer to the rebells": p. 31.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
